statements: UPDATE FinancialReports SET total_amount = 1500.00 WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE FinancialReports SET total_amount = 2000.00, report_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE patient_id = 3;
UPDATE FinancialReports SET total_amount = 1500.75 WHERE report_id = 100;
UPDATE FinancialReports SET report_date = '2023-01-15', patient_id = 200, total_amount = 2500.50 WHERE report_id = 101;
UPDATE Telehealth_Services SET service_cost = 1500.00 WHERE service_id = 3;
UPDATE Billing_Statements SET payment_status = true, total_amount = 1200.50 WHERE statement_id = 5;
UPDATE Telehealth_Services SET service_description = 'New description', service_cost = 50.00 WHERE service_id = 1
UPDATE Billing_Statements SET payment_status = TRUE, total_amount = 75.50 WHERE statement_id = 3
UPDATE Telehealth_Patients SET phone_number='555-1234' WHERE patient_id=1;
UPDATE Telehealth_Billing SET amount_due=150.75, payment_status='Paid' WHERE appointment_id=101;
UPDATE Telehealth_Patients SET phone_number='123-456-7890', date_of_birth='1990-05-20' WHERE patient_id=1;
UPDATE Telehealth_Billing SET amount_due=1500.50, payment_status='PAID' WHERE appointment_id=(SELECT appointment_id FROM Telehealth_Appointments WHERE doctor_name='Dr. Smith');
UPDATE Patients SET insurance_provider = 'Blue Cross Blue Shield' WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE Appointments SET status = 'Confirmed' WHERE appointment_id = 1002;
UPDATE Patients SET patient_name = 'John Doe', insurance_provider = 'BlueCross' WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE Bills SET total_amount = 1500.00, service_id = 2, bill_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE bill_id = 3;
UPDATE patients SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE patient_id=1;
UPDATE doctors SET phone_number='555-1234' WHERE doctor_id=2;
UPDATE patients SET phone_number = '+1-555-123-4567', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE billing_statements SET total_amount = 1000.00, paid = true, issued_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE statement_id = 3;
